name: Bumpty, walking left
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one walks around and stops periodically, sometimes turning around. It stays on ledges, and always begins facing left.

name: ...walking right
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one walks around and stops periodically, sometimes turning around. It stays on ledges, and always begins facing right.

name: Bumpty, charges the player
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one charges towards Mario, then slides around. It initially faces left, but will charge towards Mario regardless.

name: ...facing right
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one charges towards Mario, then slides around. It initially faces right, but will charge towards Mario regardless.

name: Bumpty, wave flying left to right
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one flies 4 tiles to the left in a wave pattern, and then back.

name: ...right to left
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one flies 4 tiles to the right in a wave pattern, and then back.

name: Bumpty, wave flying left
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one flies left in a wave pattern, unceasingly.

name: ...flying right
desc: A Bumpty from Yoshi's Island. This one flies right in a wave pattern, unceasingly.
